entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -10.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
